forgot-password-sub-title: We will send password reset instructions to the below email address.
forgot-password-success-msg: An email message has been sent to the provided email address with instructions on how to reset your password.
reset-password-success-msg: Your password has been successfully reset. You will be automatically redirected to the login page.
email-invalid-backend-error: Email provided is invalid, please enter a valid email address
INVALID_SIGNATURE: An internal error occured. Please try again later.
INVALID_PARAMETER: An internal error occured. Please try again later.
INVALID_FIELD_VALUE: Field value exceeds maximum permitted number of characters.
MISSING_PARAMETERS: An internal error occured. Please try again later.
INVALID_USER: An Error has occurred, please send a forgot password again.
INVALID_TOKEN: Your reset token has expired, please send a forgot password again.
INVALID_ACCOUNT: Login provided is invalid or your reset token has expired, please enter a valid email address or send a forgot password again.
INTERNAL_ERROR: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
